content:
Currently looking to fill an open SWE III position for CDC/FHIR work. Resource would be US based, a citizen and preferably local to Baltimore, MD or surrounding states. Background check and GSA will be required. Will consider remote location for the right candidate. Looking to mirror skill-set and language of a current developer. Must be comfortable communicating not only with the internal team and project stakeholders but the client as well. If interested or know someone who is please reach out to @Amy Rogers by PM or via arogers@fearless.tech.

SKILLS
Coding-Distributed / async systems-Code review and editing-Problem definition / development-Codebase management-Guide software development practice

Computer Languages
LOGO, Perl, Java, C, C++, C#, Ruby, JavaScript, Objective C, Scheme, PHP, Swift, rust, Python, go, elixir.
